rules_text:
Whenever Cosmic Manipulator or another Warlock with mana value 2 or greater enters under your control, choose one–
 • Conjure a card named Shattered Sword Warlock into your hand. [i](They’re 0/1 Warlocks that cost {B} that give each other +1/+1.)[/i]
• Create a 1/1 blue and black Warlock creature token with “When this creature dies, surveil 1” [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
